text: Tarapare se'i du'ijana mahilara ekajana tamra nikate lajukabhabe hemte ela. Se balale -- ''amara abba apanake amantrana karechena apani ye amadera jan'ya pani kha'iyechena sejan'ya apanake parisramika pradana karate.’’ Tarapara yakhana tini tara kache elena ebam tara kache brttanta barnana karalena takhana se balala -- ''bhaya karo na, tumi atyacari lokadera kabala theke raksa peyecha.’’
